Case: Estate-of-Evangeline-Young-MVA-8-12-2023
Client: Estate of Evangeline Young

__CLIENT CONTACT__
__Details:__ Def DCG attempting to state Client was not at their establishment that evening - Per BK sent Request to S/O for any evidence he has that she was in fact at DCG that night

Good afternoon Dwight,
Bryce asked me to reach to you & request a copy of a bank/credit card statement for the night of Evangeline's incident. The Defendant Derby City Gaming is attempting to claim that Evangeline was not in their establishment that evening. This is a typical defense present by many businesses in an attempt to not be held libel for over serving patrons. Please forward any evidence in your possession that Evangeline was in fact at Derby City Gaming on August 11-12, 2023. This can include text screenshots, pictures, receipts, bank/credit statements, etc. If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us directly to discuss them in further detail. -Sarena, The Whaley Law Firm
